paragraphs.text:
%spark
import org.apache.spark.mllib.rdd.RDDFunctions._
val fr = sc.textFile("s3n://1000genomes/phase3/data/HG00404/sequence_read/*_1*").sliding(4,4).map(a => a.reduce(_+"\n"+_))
val rr = sc.textFile("s3n://1000genomes/phase3/data/HG00404/sequence_read/*_2*").sliding(4,4).map(a => a.reduce(_+"\n"+_))
val inputData = fr.zip(rr).map { case(fr,rr) => fr+"\n"+rr }.saveAsTextFile("swift://mare.cpouta/alignment/interlaced_full.fastq")
